transcript:
Customer: Khatam paise vaise bhi.
Hello?
Executive: Haan hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Bol rahe hain quality to dheere dheere bigadti ja raha hai, kaha kuch improvement ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe bataoge ki aap kis company se baat kar rahe the?
Customer: DVN soft tech se.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan ji ji DVN soft tech se.
Executive: Clear voice nahi aa rahi hai aapki.
Customer: DVN soft tech se.
Executive: Okay, to main sir aapki jo leads ka jo aap issue bata rahe ho, main abhi to mera office nahi hai, office hours end ho gaye hain. Main kal morning mein aapko 9:30 ya 10 baje call karu?
Customer: Aap usko dekhiye kyu matlab lead matlab pehle theek thak aa rahe the aaj kal nahi aa raha.
Executive: Achcha abhi kitne time se nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Aap history to check karoge tabhi to.
Executive: Theek hai main check karke baki aapko ek baar aapki jo website hai wo sab check karke main kal morning mein aapko revert back karti hu.
Customer: Performance to dikhni bhi humko achcha hona chahiye, ghat hi raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Koi baat nahi main sari detail check haan main detail check karke aapko kal bata deti hu, theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai okay bye.
Executive: Okay.
[inaudible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states lead quality is deteriorating.

- Customer says leads were good earlier, not now.

- Customer says performance is decreasing.



Resolution:

- Executive will check lead history and website.

- Executive will revert back to customer tomorrow morning.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, performance, website
